Description:
FAMILY PERFECTION IN THE SCHOOL ZONE
An abundance of spacious living zones, rich hardwood floors, soaring ceilings and natural light make this generous family home one not to miss. Situated on a respectable 796sqm block with flexible indoor and outdoor living its the perfect place in which to call home. Enjoying the benefit of a quiet residential pocket ever-popular with growing families, this exceptionally presented property is further enhanced by its location in the school zone meaning you can start your next chapter knowing that quality education is at your fingertips.
The living zones comprise a warm and inviting lounge at the front of the home with a crackling open fireplace as the centrepiece. Accented by high ceilings and an elegant split-level design, this is a warm and comfortable space to relax. Positioned off this space in its own zone is a huge master retreat with decadent walk in robe/dressing room and striking ensuite with his and her vanity and double shower.
There is a second spacious family area at the back of the home meaning everyone can spread out and do their own thing with an adjacent dining zone perfect for family to congregate at meal time. The two distinct spaces are joined by the hub of the home the wonderful gourmet kitchen that will suitably impress the chef of the house. Highlights of this functional yet inviting space are stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, high-end stone benches, five-burner gas cooking and a deluxe walk in pantry. There is also a great-sized breakfast bar meaning meal-prep can be a social affair.
Accommodation features a second bedroom just off the entrance and there are two further bedrooms positioned in their own wing at the rear of the home serviced by a large central bathroom with bath and double shower. All bedrooms feature built in robes and two also have built-in desks. There is also a family sized laundry that doubles as a butlers pantry with loads of storage options to keep life clutter-free.
The outdoors features a wonderful undercover alfresco zone for year-round entertaining adjacent to a built-in gas barbeque to enjoy with family and friends. Theres also a decent lawn framed by leafy established gardens where kids and pets alike will be able to relish in the sunshine along with a veggie patch to tend to and an apple and mandarin tree.
Further highlights include ducted heating and evaporative cooling for superb comfort no matter what the season. There are also sensor lights, a doggy door, two water tanks for garden use and a garden shed. An additional stand-out feature is the double carport behind a secure roller door with an additional parking space ideal for trailers or trade vehicles. A single garage at the rear has also been converted into a home office/workshop but could easily be a man cave, she shed or teen retreat as it has direct access to the family room via a cleverly installed moving book case wall.
Add to this impressive home its proximity to both McAdam's Square and Croydon North Shopping Plaza, bus services (#672 which takes you to Croydon Station or Chirnside Park Shopping Centre), quality schools including Luther College and Yarra Valley Grammar and delightful reserves and parklands and you have the perfect family fit. Dont miss this opportunity. Enquire today. SMS 'Biak10' to 0488 825 943 for more information.
